tika-s0404t2:2_3: So hi rājapurisānaṁ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṁ, yakkhassa hatthato bhagavato hatthaṁ, bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṁ hatthaṁ gatattā nāmato hatthako āḷavakoti jāto.
tika-s0404t2:2_4: Tenāha “āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā hatthakoti laddhanāmo rājakumāro”ti.
tika-s0404t2:5_1: Aṭṭhame khīṇāsavassa sabbesaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ aniccatā asammohavasena kiccato maggapaññāya suppaṭividdhā, vipassanāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapīti dassento āha “sahavipassanāya maggapaññāyā”ti.
tika-s0404t2:5_3: Kilesavasena uppajjamāno hi pariḷāho vatthukāmasannissayo vatthukāmavisayo vāti dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viyāti “aṅgārakāsūpamā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0404t2:5_4: Anto vuccati lāmakaṭṭhena taṇhā, byantaṁ vigatantaṁ bhūtanti byantibhūtanti āha “vigatantabhūta”nti, nittaṇhanti attho.
tika-s0404t2:8_1: Navame yasmā mahiddhikapetā devāsurānaṁ āvāhaṁ gacchanti, vivāhaṁ na gacchanti, tasmā pettivisayeneva asurakāyo gahitoti veditabbo.
tika-s0404t2:8_2: Petāsurā pana petā evāti tesaṁ petehi saṅgaho avuttasiddhova.
tika-s0404t2:11_7: Santaguṇaniguhanenāti attani saṁvijjamānānaṁ jhānādiguṇānañceva bāhusaccaguṇassa dhutaṅgaguṇassa ca niguhanena chādanena.
tika-s0404t2:11_9: No mahicchassāti mahatiyā icchāya samannāgatassa no sampajjati anudhammassapi anipphajjanato.
tika-s0404t2:11_12: Ārambhavatthuvasenāti bhāvanābhiyogavasena ekībhāvova kāyavivekoti adhippeto, na gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvamattanti dasseti.
tika-s0404t2:12_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṁ samodhānaṁ saṅgaṇikā, sā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti saṅgaṇikārāmo, tassa.
tika-s0404t2:12_3: Tañca kho upadhiviveke ninnatāvasena “ayaṁ dhammo”ti vacanato.
tika-s0404t2:12_5: Vivaṭṭanissitaṁyeva hi samādhānaṁ idhādhippetaṁ, tathā paññāpi.
tika-s0404t2:12_6: Kammassa-katapaññāya hi ṭhito kammavasena bhavesu nānappakāro anatthoti jānanto kammakkhayakaraṁ ñāṇaṁ abhipattheti, tadatthañca ussāhaṁ karoti.
tika-s0404t2:12_7: Mānādayo sattasantānaṁ saṁsāre papañcenti vitthārentīti papañcāti āha “taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcarahitattā”tiādi.
